db:abstract.db:para: QAbstractPhysicalDevice is the base class used by Qt3d to interact with arbitrary input devices.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QAbstractPhysicalDevice::QAbstractPhysicalDevice(Qt3DCore::QNode *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QAbstractPhysicalDevice instance with parent.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractPhysicalDevice::addAxisSetting(Qt3DInput::QAxisSetting *axisSetting)
db:section.db:para: Add the axisSetting axisSetting to this device.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] int QAbstractPhysicalDevice::axisCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of axis this device has.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] int QAbstractPhysicalDevice::axisIdentifier(const QString &name) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the integer identifer of the axis name or -1 if it does not exist on this device.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] QStringList QAbstractPhysicalDevice::axisNames() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of the names of device's axis.

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DInput::QAxisSetting *> QAbstractPhysicalDevice::axisSettings() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the axisSettings associated with this device.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] int QAbstractPhysicalDevice::buttonCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of buttons this device has.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] int QAbstractPhysicalDevice::buttonIdentifier(const QString &name) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the integer identifer of the button name or -1 if it does not exist on this device.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] QStringList QAbstractPhysicalDevice::buttonNames() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of the names of device's buttons.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual protected] Qt3DCore::QNodeCreatedChangeBasePtr QAbstractPhysicalDevice::createNodeCreationChange() const
db:section.db:para: Used to notify observers that an button value has been changed.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractPhysicalDevice::removeAxisSetting(Qt3DInput::QAxisSetting *axisSetting)
db:section.db:para: Remove the axisSetting axisSetting to this device.
